channel.title: A Command-Against-Other-People Question
channel.description:
How do I use a command on somebody else?
NOTE: I'm talking about making like, a command to turn SOMEBODY ELSE into an NPC if you're an Admin or give THEM items or Teleport THEM somewhere.
Any help appreciated, thanks!
OTHER NOTE: I am using PimpScape.

item.title: A Command-Against-Other-People Question
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:14, topic:82041”]L2OOP

client whateverclient = whatever; whateverclient.teleportToWhatever = something; whateverclient.etc();[/quote]Do I ACTUALLY use that whatever stuff or…? lol[br][size=1]Posted on: April 20, 2007, 08:47:53 PM[/size][hr]How the heck does nobody know this?

Read full topic

item.title: A Command-Against-Other-People Question
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Are you really really stupid? I’m talking about using commands I MAKE! I want the code that I put in that command to be able to use it on another person. Geez, you really need to think more. -.-

Read full topic

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:7, topic:82041”]I Know those commands. -.- I want to know the code I need to add into my commands to be able to use them on other people.[/quote]Then go look in the TuT section…

item.title: A Command-Against-Other-People Question
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“xteletome”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.teleportToX = absX;
p.teleportToY = absY;
p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
p.updateRequired = true;
p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName);
}
else {
sendMessage(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
}
catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to tele to you…”);
}
}

if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
teleportToX = p.absX;
teleportToY = p.absY;
heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
updateRequired = true;
sendMessage("Teleto: You teleport to "+p.playerName);
}
}
catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to tele to…”);
}
}[/code] Mhmm?

Read full topic

item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

[quote=“0uch a arr0w, post:5, topic:82041”]To tele people if your an Admin:

::xteleto - Teles you to the user.
::xteletome - Teles the user to you.[/quote] I LOL’D! That’s just the command, not the code for the command lel?
